name: Seemly Bytes
description:
Survive waves of viruses as you switch weapons based on how you play! Some weapons are harder to find than others! Can you find all eight weapons?

Left Click: Primary Weapon

Right Click: Secondary Weapon

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

My first game jam game! The limitations were challenging, but I pulled through! There were a few more things I wish I could have added but was not able due to time constraints, but I think it turned out pretty well for a game made in three days in a software I had never used before!
